1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: 3 highly trained and specialist Doctors based in Irelands largest county operate the Cork Rapid Response unit, bringing the operating theatre to the roadside in some of the most extreme medical cases possible.

imdb.plot outline: This fly on the wall program follows the 4 doctors that make up the Cork Rapid Response team as they are called out to remote areas of the county to perform life saving medical operations in some of the most dangerous locations and scenarios possible.
imdb.title: Rapid Response
plot: This fly on the wall program follows the 4 doctors that make up the Cork _Rapid Response_ (qv) team as they are called out to remote areas of the county to perform life saving medical operations in some of the most dangerous locations and scenarios possible.::John Norton
